_header: To give peace to men of good will
_description: On the Nativity — three macaronic lines

BLHar665.Transcription: to geff pees to men of good wyllTo geff lyght to hem þat loked ylleAnd to draw men with lowe hym tyll
BLHar665.Note: Heading above, “De natiuitate cristi,” and to left in margin “cristus natus est” as beginning of the first line.
